item.title: Pug dies after a week of illness, customer suspects pet store is selling "Chow Chow"
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Ms. Wang and other customers are showing the pet purchase agreement form. Chongqing Business News, a dog is the most loyal friend of mankind, with this idea, recently, living in Jiulongpo District, Ba Guo City, Ms. Wang spent 1450 yuan to buy a pug, but buy back less than a week, the dog died of infection virus. It’s not a coincidence, Xiao Wu and three other people from the same pet store to buy the dog has also fallen ill, they suspect, they are bought “week dog”.
